review: I had been consulting Dr vijaya manohar since I started planning pregnancy. At 36 weeks my water bag broke and she suggested I reach hospital immediately. she examined and said we will try for normal delivery and she really did. To my surprise dr. vijaya and a whole supporting team(junior doctor and nurses) of Apollo cradle helped to me to have normal delivery. I only had my husband next to me at the moment and due to pain I had given up on having normal delivery. but the team talked me through the pain and helped me have a normal delivery. I will always be thankful for her and the team. I never knew or believed doctor's put so much effort for normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very experienced, kind and professional doctor. I was very scared as my bleeding had been going on for almost 5 weeks non stop. She ordered all the required tests and helped me understand the possibilities clearly. She is like a wise aunt who happens to be a very good gynaec also. Would recommend.

Doctor ** ********* *** friendly, explained all the things in a proper manner..  but the charges of checkups I think is way too high compared to other hospitals and also the staff is rude and misguided us on the checkup process which led us to disappoint not expected this kind of treatment from a hospital like Apollo.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is the perfect Gynec, she treats the patients very well, I felt very safe with her for my first pregnancy and I will go with her again for my second pregnancy also. She makes us comfortable and it feels more like a family person with her. I recommend her for every lady. Perfect Gynec 😊

I had my second c-section done by this Dr. through out the consultations she has been friendly and communicating well. ******** **** ** ***** ** *** ********* ******* * **** *** *** **** * **** **** *** ******** ** ** ****** I had my first c-section done in Hyderabad and after few months I couldn't even notice the scar where the incision was made. But with my 2nd, done through this Dr, few months post partum, when I finally had a chance to look at my incision, I noticed two scars running through out the length of my abdomen. And the doctors never mentioned why this had to be done. And the scars are very prominent too. Although, I do not have any other issues with the surgery, * **** ** ** **** ************** ** *** *** ** not have mentioned why there was need to make two incisions. * ** *** ***** *** ** **** ******* **** *** ***** ** *** ***** ** ** **** ***** ** **** ********* ******** ** ** **** **** *** *** ********** I would not recommend this Dr. if you are someone who cares about the aesthetics of the procedure too.

I felt violated!
I have scanty periods with no other issues as such. Doctor wanted to examine me physically. She used some spoon like steel article and literally pushed it inside me. It was awfully painful! She said you need to pass urine and it won't pain after that. I obeyed. She did the same thing again. This time I couldn't take it any further and had to tell her to stop digging inside me.By this time, I already had tears rolling down my eyes.  Looking at me, she said, ur married for so long, all this shouldn't hurt! Can you imagine the insensitivity!  After this she inserted her gloved finger which was also painful and that is when she finally had some mercy and used some gel onto her finger to perform the physical test. 
In my opinion, she could have at least used the gel from the first time itself and shouldn't have to wait for me to ask her to stop!! I had read good reviews about her but I should have noticed that only pregnancy cases had given good reviews!
Go at your own risk and with mental preparation to be tormented at some really sensitive parts of your body!
reply_text:
Hi Surya Rawlani. That spoon like steel as you mentioned wasn't taken from the kitchen. And visiting to a gynaecologist, you expect to just be inspected without being examined, so that you can post a comment that you were not even examined. And how are you so sure that gel was not used before examining from the first time. How do you think 35years would've passed. 
Please think before posting such rude comments for a doctor with 35years experience in the field.
replier_name: Sharada Woman, Child and Skin Care Centre

review:
The experience was  fine till the time doctor   did the initial analysis. Pat that, she recommended some tests before giving any prescriptions . Mostly blood. She also recommended her own lab which resides in the same premises. The horror began then. The staff is very shabby and iI wouldlike to believe incompetent. M pretty sure they did not go through even a basic training. They pierced the needle incorrectly into my wife's am and tried drawing blood. Failed and induced a lot of pain. Tried again after taking the syringe out and re inserting. Failed again.. More pain... 
Then they resorted to the palm area. Drew a few drops of blood and misguided the needle again. This time they tried inserting back the blood along with air into the veins. My wife felt as if a lightning struck her hand  and the pain was excruciating. They took out the needle and we're ready for another try. I lost my cool and stupid them while my wife ws cryingin pain. All this just to draw blood. After that,  iI hadto rush my wife to another hospital to get this treated. She wd keptunder observation and then under medicines till now. Been close to 4 days and she is still not able to work properly with her hand and taking pain killers.  M planning to sue them. Any pointers are appreciated. Please be aware before visiting this place.

It was less to do with the doctor than their admin, and may be your team as well. Why are you getting clinics on board if they can't handle the rush? They have people walking in, plus they have Practo appointements. How will the doctor manage?
And seriously you have give 15-minute slots of appointment. Do you guys realise that gynaec problems take a lot of talking and diagnosis? How will the patient move over to the next?
My appointment was at 8 pm, and I was finally called in at 8.45. And the doc was clearly in a rush to go home because the clnic closes at 9 pm. It's not her fault. But there were just so many patients waiting for her still. 
You must ask them to cap the number of patient visits.
And please ask the admin/receptionist not to enter the cabin when the patient is talking. A patient is aggrieved, he or she wants a doctor's total attendance.

Doc was really good.. But appointment with practo doesnot count. You need to wait in the queue anyway. My turn came only after 45 mi .. Which was a little disappointing since I need to postpone couple of things for this and this more imp for me. 

The doc was very friendly and prescribed some tablets which had no side effects. 

The lab is inside the hospital so need not travel separately for the blood tests and reports.. 

All my reports were good so it would have been great if the root cause of my problem was noticed..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would really recommend Dr. vijaya, at this pandemic situation, through video call could able to solve my problm. Doctor is so humble, later also I called her to chek doubts, but madam listened and explained so well. Like these doctors are boon to society.

I have recommended her name to many other friends and who ever has returned from her, they were happy and impressed.

I have been visiting this doctor since 3 year for health issue and problem related to pregnency. Doctor is very friendly and very good. She helps me a lot to conceive and during pregnancy. She has given proper treatment and only basic test she advised. Not like others who will suggest a lot of test.. I m very happy with doctor and will go again in future for any issue.......

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ** **** my pregnancy and delivery went so smooth.she gives so much of confidence and her evaluation, approach and medication are 100% on point.I have deep trust in her.I highly recommend people to go to this Dr.

Consulted dr Vijaya for my second pregnancy. Very reasonable and genuine consultation. Felt comfortable and gone through peaceful diagnosis , checkups throughout my pregnancy. She allowed for natural contractions during labour and its normal delivery :)

I visited to this Hospital Advised by My Friend.and I So much Satisfied with this Clinic..Everything is in Perfect Manner.and Observation,Care of  Test and Reports advising and Everything is Perfect with this.
Please Go ahead with this Clinic.and You will not Consult any doctor after to Dr.Vijaya Manohar.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Mine was natural pregnancy but year back during the initial days itself i had severe bleeding and through out pregnancy had lot of on & off stomach pain. 
We had left hopes due to the bleeding for around 20days. Today we have are blessed with baby boy and its all because of the treatment she recommended. I had to undergo lot of medicines but the end result was so happy by god's grace. I appreciate her patience, even if i call her at night 10:00 she answered and calmed me.

She is very polite to answer all the queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor seemed to be very busy on our first visit suggested we see her again (preferably in her own clinic) after a scan.Went to her with the scan reports, we were charged consultation fees again and doctor hardly spent any time in examining the patient or explaining the problem. Answers only questions that we ask, no suggestion whatsoever. Reluctant to do an internal examination citing lack of time( happened on both the visits). Says she has other patients waiting and also has OT duty. Asked us to wait till she is done with her OT duty.Would never revisit or recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I paid 700 rupees even though the fee was 500 given on Practo. I went inside and within 5 mins of seeing only she said that the issue cannot be tackled by her and is a dermatologist issue. I had a small boil on my vagina which was burning and itching. *** ***** **** ****** ******* ** *** ********* ** **** **** ** ******** ** ***** *** *** *** **** She simple sent me back saying go to a dermatologist. I even called her later asking to suggest some tube since it was paining. She simply cut the call on me. I would never ever recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I made an appointment for 7pm and showed up on time. I only went in at 8:05pm. She asked me some general information and when I opened my phone to check my period dates, she literally told me "you should know your period dates without looking at your phone." Then like always instead of asking me if I was sexually active, she asked me if I am single or married. When I told her my problem, she started asking me for reasons. ** * **** *** ***** * **** **** ** **** When she was doing my exam, it hurt and she very rudely said "hold on hold on." She also insisted that I get an HIV test done even though I told her that I had always used protection. 

Just very rude and unprofessional. * ****** **** **** *** ********** ** **** ***** ** ********** *** * *****
reply_text:
Hi. Since you went to a gynaecologist, it is understood you should be knowing ur dates. It was a passing question which is asked to everyone. 
And being sexually active is considered as married in India. So how could that be offensive. As a rule given in our textbooks, and with 35years of my experience, it is mandatory to do HIV test in any vaginal/genital issues, whether protection is taken or not, whether married or unmarried, whether man or woman, whether you feel you need it not. Please do not post such rude comments without understanding how 35years experience in this field would've gone by.
replier_name: Sharada Woman, Child and Skin Care Centre

review:
We consulted Dr Vijaya Manohar for our child's delivery and we were glad we did.

Very methodical and patient. She has a vast experience and gives the right advice. 

She insists on natural delivery and was extremely professional during the entire delivery process too.

Doctor was very de-motivating. First pregnancy. M diabetic. Doctor said... Let's see what best we can do.. Statement was very scary. For doctors we can be 100th patient but for parents it's there first baby.. No proper explanation given.. Very disappointed

I visited dr vijaya manohar for my pregnency from the day i  got conceive..such a good doctor she is very friendly,kind and polite...and finally by god grace and by her grace got normal delivery at Apollo cradle..such a great experience with dr vijaya manohar...thank u so much mam

Her expertise and experience shows in her handling of patients and patient care. She gave ample time to patiently listen to my issues and was also very thorough. She's very friendly and her kind smiling demeanor helps.
She is very experienced and gives the right advice without pushing for unnecessary tests. I would recommend her any day
Excellent Doctor, very patient and makes you very comfirtable. I have 2 kids I consulted her for both the pregnancies for my wife no issues at all... Definitely recommended...
Doctor response is very good. Lot of patience she has and she will not simply recommend for tests and scans.

context: Stomach Cramps,Laparoscopic Gynaecology,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Irregular Periods,
review: Very good well experienced doctor. Having more no of years experience. Understands the all the stages of pregnancy very well and suggest the right solution.

We went for general checkup for pregnancy. It was our 4th visit to her and she listens to us and would advice nice. One thing that we like about her is that she wouldn't give medicines unless required. She wrote us many optional medicines and asked to have only and only if some problem happens like if u have frequent vomiting have this tab, one odd is fine. Second best thing i liked is that she gave us tests request which is required for next visit. Usually you will see that you visit the doc, she gives test and u visit again. Even before 1st visit, we had called her, she adviced not to come  come without ultrasound done else consultation would be of no use. We liked that approach as it same both our time and her time as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

review: Doctor did not address the concern issues well, i still have doubts over the issue. ** ****** *** *** ****** ********* ** ** ******** ** ********* ****. She charged me double for consultation in the same day, which seems abnormal .
reply_text: Hi. The morning fees would've been taken in the hospital you visited. And evening in the private clinic. You asked questions, you were given time and answers, then how could charging the fees be abnormal. If you still had doubts, you shouldve clarified them, instead of posting it here.
